channel.title: SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_DedicatedHost on SoftLayer API
channel.description: Recent content in SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_DedicatedHost on SoftLayer API

item.title: cancelItem
item.description:
REST Example 

curl -g -u $SL_USER:$SL_APIKEY -X POST -d '{"parameters": [boolean, boolean, string, string]}' \
'https://api.softlayer.com/rest/v3.1/SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_DedicatedHost/{SoftLayer_Billing_Item_Virtual_DedicatedHostID}/cancelItem'
